title: Bezos’ 4.5M Year Head Start, RAINBOW FENTANYL = Y2K? 10.19.22
itunes:title: Bezos’ 4.5M Year Head Start, RAINBOW FENTANYL = Y2K? 10.19.22
description:
In episode 1354, Jack and Miles are joined by comedians and hosts of StraightioLab, Sam Taggert and George Civeris, to discuss… Oh no way, people don’t want to work at Amazon? Rainbow Fentanyl Is The Latest Halloween Freak-Out and more!

  1. Oh no way, people don’t want to work at Amazon?
  2. 9 Ways to Imagine Jeff Bezos' Wealth
  3. Rainbow Fentanyl Is The Latest Halloween Freak-Out
  4. RNC Chair Ronna McDaniel Bashes Joe Biden, Democrats over Politicizing ‘Rainbow Fentanyl’
  5. Ahead of Halloween, drug agents warning parents about 'rainbow fentanyl'
  6. Is 'rainbow fentanyl' a threat to your kids this Halloween? Experts say no
  7. Rainbow fentanyl – the newest Halloween scare

LISTEN: Tukaria by Cochemea

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
